title: Topic 001 Question 797
body: A company wants to set up a high-speed connection between its data center and its applications that run on AWS. The company must not transfer data over the internet.
Which action should the company take to meet these requirements?
options: Transfer data to AWS by using AWS Snowball.
Transfer data to AWS by using AWS Storage Gateway.
Set up a VPN connection between the data center and an AWS Region.
Set up an AWS Direct Connect connection between the company network and AWS.
